summary.overallFindings: NRG Energy, Inc. demonstrates comprehensive responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with detailed policies, governance frameworks, and public commitments. The company provides concrete evidence of transparency, fairness, explainability, oversight, privacy, governance, and external engagement. Their approach is well-documented and externally recognized, reflecting a mature and proactive responsible AI program.
